name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text:
I will definitely get back here for more
The Sake Combo with Spicy Garlic Broth is perfect match.
The ramen has a rich broth and spicy as i ordered the Spicy Garlic Pork Ramen. Paris with the combo with hot sake is top notch.
The staffs are friendly, with their cultural greetings.
Their focus is the ramen menus only, and that is what i like so they concentrate more focus on the ramen taste.
Only just they have a quite limited space, but that is fine for me.

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: the service was a bit slow, we waited 30 mins for our two bowls. i’ve visited this location twice but the broth is not as flavourful as i’d like it to be. for the price i also think you can get much better ramen in the area (probably for cheaper too). the space is also really cramped, you can barely move. the staff are really nice though and the bathroom has mouthwash which is a nice touch 🙂

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text:
Never had that bad service ever.
Especially the red hair girl Japanese server.
There are much more Ramen choice in Vancouver I would rather go Denbo.
I don’t know where the high rate comes from.

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: Very clean and cozy place! The ramen was delicious, the staff were friendly, and the prices were great.
owner_answer: Thank you for your kind words, Vlada! We’re thrilled you enjoyed the ramen, our friendly staff, and the cozy atmosphere. 🍜😊 Your support means a lot, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: Really good ramen! I feel the variety is good and the quality is always very consistent. All the staff are very friendly. Highly recommend!
review_questions_Noise level: Loud, but you can still talk

spicy garlic pork ramen 난 맵찔이지만 적당히 매워서 맛있게 잘먹음. 사실 매운 거보다 짠 게 더 커서 맵다고 느껴지지 않았음.

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: I don’t get the hype. Terrible service. As you can see the pork was poorly cooked (didn’t even try to eat it). And the tables are so close that when people slide by to sit down their whole butt gets all over your table. But maybe that’s your thing.

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: Nothing to complain! Food was good, service and atmosphere were great.

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: Had the beef ramen. Good chain. Happy to try other places in the neighborhood also happy to drop in again.

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text:
It was freezing today — the kind of weather that makes you feel ramen was invented just for this moment. So I finally went to try this shop that’s been around for about a year.

I saw they had a combo with my all-time favorite, Coke. Didn’t even look at the price — just went “yes please.” Big mistake. The Coke came in a cup, not a can, not a fancy glass bottle — just… a cup. But hey, it still tasted like Coke, so fine.

Then came the gyoza — fried but somehow not oily. Crispy, tasty, and honestly the best kind of surprise. You can even pick pork or veggie filling. There was some mysterious sauce drizzled on top — looked suspicious, tasted like nothing, and I still have no clue what it was. But whatever, the gyoza was great, mystery sauce forgiven.

For ramen, I went thick noodles (because who eats thin noodles on a cold day?) and picked the spicy garlic flavor. Man, that was good. The broth was rich, the noodles chewy, and the char siu had that perfect fire-kissed smell — not too burnt, just enough to make you feel like you’re at a BBQ in ramen form.

Everything was amazing… until the bill came. Add 15% tip, and boom — over thirty bucks. For lunch.  That’s a bit steep for a regular weekday lunch.

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: Awesome! Absolutely recommended 😋

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: ＼(￣０￣)／ fattest noodle 🍜
owner_answer: Hi John! Haha, we’re all about those thick, delicious noodles! Thanks for the shoutout — can’t wait to serve you another bowl soon! 🍜😄

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: Great service!! The beef miso was not 100% my taste, but my friends really liked their food.
owner_answer: Thank you for your kind words about our service, Zwibie! We’re glad your friends enjoyed their meals, and we appreciate your honest feedback about the beef miso. We hope you’ll find something more to your taste on your next visit — there are plenty of delicious options to explore! Looking forward to welcoming you back soon.
review_questions_None: Vegetarian options, Parking, Kid-friendliness, Wheelchair accessibility

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text:
We came to this restaurant after attending a hockey game, as it’s conveniently located nearby. The location is great, and overall, the food was quite good. We decided to order the combo meal, which turned out to be a good value for the price. In addition to that, we also ordered the spicy garlic pork dish. However, we were disappointed to find that it did not come with the egg and seaweed as shown in the photo on the menu. The image was quite misleading and gave us the wrong impression of what to expect.

When we brought this up with the female server, she was very dismissive and rude. She didn't take the time to explain the issue or provide any clarification. We also asked a male staff member about the star symbol that appeared next to the item on the menu, hoping for some insight. Unfortunately, he had no idea what it meant and wasn’t able to offer any explanation either.

While we did enjoy the food itself, the service was extremely disappointing. The staff, especially the lady who served us, were unhelpful and lacked basic customer service skills. Because of the poor service experience, we’ve decided that we will not be returning to this location in the future.
review_photo_ids: CIABIhCf6VOkFTiSzN1rGD0RDQph, CIABIhCrTEuINGxXdrq58I9ORRhM, CIABIhB2fh8F2clQc-iIl7bKAtqO, CIABIhCVimUgy-Llu5yIeYKLg6OX, CIABIhBhsyumGXW5HuhbInyPeMfQ, CIABIhCCi164DjZJWazt69JvyM-g, CIABIhAoGGCKwrb2AqhrHY_-qFAZ, CIABIhBe99gzb5aLor7d04ASnK-h, CIABIhCGEy0lyG1gKwhVf_tAjuQ0, CIABIhBVmEUvJ_8hPAfKE8C8HwnV, CIABIhCzh7UmhA4Mfj9ZPMn2PU5S, CIABIhDRzi1qCr0mrONBHeoaTbbo, CIABIhAdqcErKMpxW06VdGV7zUbZ, CIABIhD0AJE9qtAey8Y3bpg50_rM, CIABIhDSQ1s9GLvobTS1CLRlCqIE, CIABIhBZ-1-49-ieXKv9ZSAKdRnN, CIABIhAGQO0QV4NzJqS1CoMdpBek, CIABIhB0LMTlPHWKZdmu4_DXlihy
owner_answer:
Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We’re glad to hear you enjoyed the food and found the combo meal a good value, but we’re truly sorry that the service and communication fell short during your visit.

The star symbol on our menu highlights Kinton’s best-selling items. We’re sorry if that wasn’t clearly explained and if the menu image caused any confusion. The egg and seaweed are listed in the dish description when included, but we understand how that could have been misleading.

We’ll be sure to review this with our team to ensure they’re better prepared to answer menu questions with clarity and kindness. Thank you again for your honest feedback — it really helps us improve both our service and the overall guest experience.

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: Great ramen at a really good price point
owner_answer: Thanks for the fantastic review, Bob_Troll! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed our ramen and found it a great value. We can’t wait to welcome you back for another delicious bowl!

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: This is the most delicious ramen I’ve ever had! 🍜I absolutely love your place — the food, the atmosphere, and your amazing staff. Arigato! 💛
owner_answer: Thank you so much for your wonderful review, Olya! 💛 We’re thrilled to hear you loved the ramen, the atmosphere, and our team. Arigato for sharing your kind words—we can’t wait to welcome you back for another delicious meal! 🍜

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
owner_answer: Hi Claudia, thank you for your rating! We hope to see you back soon.

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: Great taste and service. I'm going to visit again.
owner_answer: Thank you so much for your kind words, Chloe! 😊 We’re glad you enjoyed the taste and service, and we can’t wait to welcome you back soon! 🍜💛

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text:
Kinton is solid place to get ramen. I got the sweet and spicy ramen with ground meat for $19.99.
It was delicious. Not necessarily authentic, but very tasty nonetheless. Portions are great.
If you are in the area and looking to get ramen, check Kinton out. 4/5 for me.
owner_answer: Thank you so much for the thoughtful review, Anton! We’re really happy to hear you enjoyed the Sweet & Spicy Ramen — it’s great to know the flavor and portion size hit the mark for you. We appreciate your honest feedback about authenticity and are glad you still found it delicious and worth recommending. That means a lot to us! Hope to welcome you back again soon for another solid bowl 🍜

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text:
Based on a personal recommendation from my friend, we first visited this eatery yesterday and oh boy, it did not disappoint!
I ordered pork ramen, and it was one of the best I had tasted in decades!
Gyoza, on the side, waa also very good!
owner_answer: Thank you so much for your wonderful review, Raul! We’re thrilled to hear your first visit lived up to the recommendation and that you enjoyed the pork ramen and gyoza. Your kind words mean a lot to our team, and we can’t wait to welcome you back for another delicious meal! 🍜🥟

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: It was great, quick and tasty
owner_answer: Thank you so much for your wonderful comment, Ati! We’re glad you enjoyed your meal and had a quick, tasty experience. 🍜💛 We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text:
When we first came here months ago the Pork original was so good so we came back today. Ordered the same thing and noticed they changed the broth. The broth was so bland that almost tasteless. Maybe some customers complained it’s too salty but you’re not supposed to drink all ramen soup.
The chashu was just bland pork. It’s an insult for chashu to call it chashu.
Good service so very sad they changed their soup!!!
owner_answer:
Thank you so much for coming back and for sharing your thoughts with us — it really means a lot that you remembered and returned for the ramen you loved. We're so sorry to hear that this visit didn’t live up to your last experience. We truly appreciate your honest feedback about the broth and chashu — consistency and balance of flavour are things we take seriously, and we’ll be sure to share your comments with our kitchen team.

It’s wonderful to hear that you still found the service good, and we hope you’ll consider giving us another chance to bring back the flavour and warmth you enjoyed before.

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: This place is a good option if you’re craving a quick ramen. However, the flavor is quite bland.
owner_answer: Thank you so much for your comment, Lyon. We're glad to hear we could be a convenient ramen option for you! We’re sorry to hear the flavor didn’t quite hit the mark — we appreciate the honest feedback. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back and make your next bowl more memorable!

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: Kinton has always been my go-to for Ramen 🍜. It was my first time in Vancouver, and I had to try Ramen because of the rainy weather( Obvious in Vancouver). I went to this place and was not disappointed. It’s very good! Had to wait for a bit as usual, but it’s worth the wait. Definitely recommend! 👍
owner_answer: Hi Saurav, thank you for your rating! We hope to see you back soon.

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: Surprised how many good reviews this place has. We got a pork original and the broth was quite bland. The chashu didn't have that BBQ/grilled flavor/taste, it was fine but nothing special. Service was fine but slow, not enough servers for how busy it was at 11:30pm. Price was good. Good place for a late night ramen when everything else is closed but I wouldn't come for dinner.
owner_answer:
Thank you for sharing your detailed feedback, Daniel. We’re sorry to hear that the pork original ramen didn’t meet your expectations and that the chashu didn’t have the flavour you were hoping for.

We also appreciate your comments about service — we understand how it can feel slow when the restaurant is busy. Your feedback is valuable, and we’ll share it with our team as we continue to improve.

We’re glad you found it a convenient late-night option and appreciate your honesty. We hope to have the chance to provide a better experience for dinner in the future.

name: KINTON RAMEN ROBSON
review_text: Pork original 很美味，湯頭不是很鹹的那種，天氣冷可以喝熱熱的湯很幸福。
owner_answer: Thank you for your wonderful feedback, Joyce! We’re so glad to hear you enjoyed the pork original and that the soup was just right for the cold weather. We look forward to serving you another bowl soon!
